body:
This is a pretty big point for a site that is the biggest Minecraft affiliated website.
Big for having the absolute biggest forum gathering and community for Minecraft.

This is a site with a #1,915 global rank worldwide, making it the 1,915th most popular website online.
This is a site with 26 million hits per month, and Avicus therefore has potential exposure of 26 million hits a month.
This is a site with the average time of 3 minutes, which is 3 more minutes for exposure.

While the numbers are currently small, regardless, it's a very large scope for reach. Regardless of whether we gain more players for this, it's still a great achievement for Avicus to recognize.

title: Featured on the front of MinecraftForums.net!

replies.body: Wow, that's amazing! I hope we have a huggeeee increase of players soon!
replies.body_tagged: Wow, that's amazing! I hope we have a huggeeee increase of players soon!

replies.body: Great job, in-flux of players or not, nice achievement. :)
replies.body_tagged: Great job, in-flux of players or not, nice achievement. :)

replies.body: Hopefully new players start rolling in.
replies.body_tagged: Hopefully new players start rolling in.

replies.body: Meeting with news friends is good. But my current friends are enough for me honestly :) But I'd enjoy to make new friends anyways. ;p
replies.body_tagged: Meeting with news friends is good. But my current friends are enough for me honestly :) But I'd enjoy to make new friends anyways. ;p

replies.body: That's Great! It will be good to get a lot of new players for avicus.
replies.body_tagged: That's Great! It will be good to get a lot of new players for avicus.

replies.body: QUICKLY! FIX ALL THE EXTRA GLITCHES
replies.body_tagged: QUICKLY! FIX ALL THE EXTRA GLITCHES

replies.body: This can be a bad thing if the server is in a shit condition.
replies.body_tagged: This can be a bad thing if the server is in a shit condition.

replies.body: Avicus - but we have site with #1915 global rank worldwide :D
replies.body_tagged: Avicus - but we have site with #1915 global rank worldwide :D

replies.body: Looks like blocklag isn't an issue anymore, though. Neither is the invisible fire, random lag spiking, rubber banding, scrim server reserving, boats breaking in spectator mode, dying wool to glitch a capture, or anything else. I think we're fine for a few extra players.

replies.body: Looks like this brought all the hackers to our server lol

replies.body: The Fast Hit/Fast Death glitch still happens on Cth and Nexus. In walls, if you are flying over your own side when the game starts you fall to your death. Neb isnt the only game mode :P
